member.name: T:Microsoft.TestPlatform.VsTestConsole.TranslationLayer.ConsoleParameters
member.summary: Class which defines additional specifiable parameters for vstest.console.exe

member.name: P:Microsoft.TestPlatform.VsTestConsole.TranslationLayer.ConsoleParameters.LogFilePath
member.summary: Full path for the log file

member.name: P:Microsoft.TestPlatform.VsTestConsole.TranslationLayer.ConsoleParameters.PortNumber
member.summary: Port Number for communication vstest.console will need this port number to communicate with this component - translation layer Currently Internal as we are not intentionally exposing this to consumers of translation layer

member.name: P:Microsoft.TestPlatform.VsTestConsole.TranslationLayer.ConsoleParameters.ParentProcessId
member.summary: Parent Process ID of the process whose lifetime should dictate the life time of vstest.console.exe vstest.console will need this process ID to know when the process exits. If parent process dies/crashes without invoking EndSession, vstest.console should exit immediately Currently Internal as we are not intentionally exposing this to consumers of translation layer
